quat.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quat1.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quat.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

quat1.text: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.

quat.text: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.

quat1.text: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.

quat.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

quat1.text: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

quat.text: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.

quat1.text: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.

quat.text: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

quat1.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quat.text: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

quat1.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.

quat.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

quat1.text: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

quat.text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

quat1.text: If life were predictable it would cease to be life and be without flavor.

quat.text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.

quat1.text: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.

quat.text: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

quat1.text: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.

quat.text: Life is never fair, and perhaps it is a good thing for most of us that it is not.

quat1.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.

quat.text: In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love.

quat1.text: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.

quat.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

quat1.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

quat.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

quat1.text: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.

quat.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.

quat1.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quat.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

quat1.text: May you live all the days of your life.

quat.text: Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.

quat1.text: Do not let making a living prevent you from making a life.

quat.text: Life is ours to be spent, not to be saved.

quat1.text: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.

quat.text: Life is a long lesson in humility.

quat1.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.

quat.text: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.

quat1.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.

quat.text: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.

quat1.text: Life is made of ever so many partings welded together.

quat.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma — which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

quat1.text: Life is trying things to see if they work.

quat.text: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

quat1.text: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quat.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

quat1.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quat.text: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.

quat1.text: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.

quat.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

quat1.text: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it; whether you choose to persevere.

quat.text: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.

quat1.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

quat.text: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quat1.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quat.text: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember — the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.

quat1.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

quat.text: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.

quat1.text: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes but they don't quit.
